# Test: grove prune detects worktree with gone upstream (dry-run)
setup_workspace feature-to-delete

exec grove add feature-to-delete
exec git -C $WORK/testrepo branch -D feature-to-delete
exec grove prune
stderr 'Would prune 1 worktree'
stderr 'feature-to-delete'
stderr 'Run with --commit to remove'
exists ../feature-to-delete
